dominant_effect: Characters making Arcana checks in downtime can add a bonus to the roll equal to half the highest level spell slot that they have (rounded down).
When you harvest a reagent or Meat in downtime, roll 1d6. On a 6, you harvest an additional reagent of that type.

When starting a quest each player can roll 1d20, on a 20 they can keep that roll and use a reaction to replace one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw with that roll during the quest. On a roll of a 1, the DM can choose to replace on attack roll, saving throw, or ability check that character makes with a 1 that session.
Characters making STR or WIS checks with tools gain +2 during downtime.

When starting a quest each player can roll 1d20, on a 20 they can keep that roll and use a reaction to replace one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw with that roll during the quest. On a roll of a 1, the DM can choose to replace on attack roll, saving throw, or ability check that character makes with a 1 that session.
Characters may add a +1 to all INT checks made during downtime. In addition, the cost to train a new language or tool is reduced by 10gp.
At the start of each quest, every character gains 10ft of darkvision or extends their darkvision by 10ft.
Whenever a plant is harvested, roll 1d8, on an 8 an additional 1 of that plant is harvested. Not applicable to trees or plants with multiple harvest types.
Lawful characters start each quest with Temp HP equal to their level.
Every neutral character starts the quest with Sanctuary. This Sanctuary lasts until it is broken.
Each week roll 1d10, on a ten the seas have favourable winds and one ship arrives one week faster.
Chaotic characters gain a +2 bonus to Stealth, Deception, Investigation, and Performance checks.
You gain an additional 2 hours of free time a week.
Characters making Athletics, Acrobatics, or weapon checks during downtime gain +1. In addition, the cost to train in a new weapon is reduced by 10gp.
